translations: adj.秘书的，有关秘书工作的

sentences.sentence: I help out with the secretarial work.
I was doing temporary secretarial work.
sentences.translation: 我在做临时的秘书工作。

sentences.sentence: I took a series of badly paid secretarial jobs which made me really miserable.
sentences.translation: 我连着干了几份工资很低的秘书工作，这让我感到真的很痛苦。
